salesforce:query.doc:name: Query - User
salesforce:query.salesforce:salesforce-query: Select Id from User where Email= ':createdByEml' limit 1

logger.doc:name: Log Error
logger.message: File ID: #[vars.file.Id], File Name: #[vars.fileName] --> xx. ERROR: User Email Send Failure: #[vars.SFdoEmailResp.doEmailOutput] User Email Payload: #[vars.emailPayload]

set-variable.value: #["There was error sending email to the User for File ID: " ++ vars.file.Id ++ ", File Name: " ++ vars.fileName ++ "\r\n\nPlease check Mule Logs for details."]
set-variable.doc:name: set emailBody

logger.doc:name: User Email Sent.
logger.message: File ID: #[vars.file.Id], File Name: #[vars.fileName] --> xx. User Email Sent for template : #[vars.useTemplateName]

salesforce:query.doc:name: Query - User
salesforce:query.salesforce:salesforce-query: Select Id from User where Email= ':supportEmail' limit 1

logger.doc:name: Log Email Failure
logger.message: File ID: #[vars.file.Id], File Name: #[vars.fileName] --> xx. ERROR: Support Email Failure: #[vars.SFdoEmailResp.doEmailOutput] Support Email Payload: #[vars.emailPayload]

logger.doc:name: User Email Sent.
logger.message: File ID: #[vars.file.Id], File Name: #[vars.fileName] --> xx. Support Email Sent.
